original: Östlund, Bo Ernst Gustav (Gösta) Edward, civilingenjör, Limmared, f. 26/ 7/00 i Sthlm av fabr. Edward o. Lisen Östlund. G. m. Karin Lindgren. Barn: Kajsa f. 29, Per Johan 31, Lars 32, Björn 315, Ove 36, Bo 40, Bertil 43. — Stud:ex. 21, avg:ex. fr. KTH 26. Disp. v. Skrufs Nya Glasbruks A-B i Skruv 27-30, förv. v. Orrefors Bruks A-B, Sandviks Glasbruk i Hovmantorp 30-35, disp :assist. h. A-B Fredr. Brusewitz i Limmared 35-37, disp. där 37-47. Verkst. dir. i Limmareds Bruk fr. 47.
translated: Östlund, Bo Ernst Gustav (Gösta) Edward, civil engineer, from Limmared, born on July 26, 1900 in Stockholm to Edward, a fabricator, and Lisen Östlund. Married to Karin Lindgren. Children: Kajsa, born in 1929; Per Johan, born in 1931; Lars, born in 1932; Björn, born in 1935; Ove, born in 1936; Bo, born in 1940; Bertil, born in 1943. Completed secondary school in 1921, graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) in 1926. Worked as a trainee at Skrufs Nya Glasbruks A-B in Skruv from 1927 to 1930, then employed at Orrefors Bruks A-B and Sandviks Glasbruk in Hovmantorp from 1930 to 1935. Became a dispatch assistant at A-B Fredr. Brusewitz in Limmared from 1935 to 1937, and continued as a dispatch supervisor until 1947. Appointed as the managing director of Limmareds Bruk from 1947 onwards.

workExperience.name: Orrefors Bruks A-B and Sandviks Glasbruk
